bug_report1.title: Incorrect Placement of 'Start' Button
steps_to_reproduce: Open the application on a smartphone.
Observe the position of the 'Start' button.
bug_report1.expected_result: The 'Start' button should be positioned at the bottom of the screen.
bug_report1.actual_result: The 'Start' button is located in the center of the screen.
bug_report1.screenshot: attached screenshot or provide a detailed description
